name: Bloody Faerie
description: You hate faeries, unicorns and dragons? Take AK-47 and show them what you think about them! The invasion of magic has started! The civilization is collapsing! Donâ€™t wait, take up your gun and fight! Drown the evil, magic creatures in the sea of their blood!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7870 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 6800K 3.4 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 770 / AMD FX-8350 Storage: 3 GB available space
